transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Uh, hi, I need to schedule an appointment for a sore throat, like, today or tomorrow. Can you help me?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Uh, no, I'm just trying to schedule an appointment. Can we move on?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. May I have your date of birth to get started with booking your appointment?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's 05/15/1988. Can we hurry this up?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Mike,

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll need your full name including your last name to pull up your record. You provide your first and last name?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yeah, it's Chris Taylor. Can we skip ahead?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Just to confirm, I have your name as Chris Taylor and your date of birth as May fifteenth nineteen eighty eight. Is that correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yeah, that’s right. Can we just get to the appointment?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If yes, please provide that number.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Um, sure, it’s 555-123-4567. Just want to get this done.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're not sure, I can confirm your name and date of birth again. Just let me know what you prefer.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I’m sure, just look it up with my number. Can we move on?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't proceed further right now.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Alright, thank you so much. Bye bye.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll make sure our clinic support team follows up with you. One moment while I document your request.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Uh, wait, I just want to schedule an appointment, not have a follow-up. Can we do that?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. The

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Can we just get to the appointment part?
